div.data-mendix-props: "widgetTree":[{"$widgetId":"21.WorkflowCommons.UserTask_Assign.layoutGrid1","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"mx-name-layoutGrid1 mx-layoutgrid mx-layoutgrid-fluid container-fluid","content":[{"$widgetId":"21.WorkflowCommons.UserTask_Assign.layoutGrid1$row0","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"row","content":[{"$widgetId":"21.WorkflowCommons.UserTask_Assign.layoutGrid1$row0$column0","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"col-lg col-md col","content":[{"$widgetId":"21.WorkflowCommons.UserTask_Assign.dataView1","widget":"DataView","props":{"class":"mx-name-dataView1 form-horizontal","object":{"$type":"AssociationObjectProperty","dataSourceId":"21.11","scope":"$WorkflowUserTask","editable":true},"emptyMessage":{"$type":"TextProperty","value":""},"body":[{"$widgetId":"21.WorkflowCommons.UserTask_Assign.container1","widget":"Container","props":{"class":"mx-name-container1 alert alert-info spacing-outer-bottom-medium","renderMode":"div","onClick":null,"content":[{"$widgetId":"21.WorkflowCommons.UserTask_Assign.text1","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text1","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"When assigning users that are not targeted for this task, note that these users will be added to the list of targeted users automatically.\r\nPlease also make sure that the user has corresponding permissions to complete the user task."},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"span"}}],"ariaHidden":false}},{"$widgetId":"21.WorkflowCommons.UserTask_Assign.tabContainer1","widget":"TabContainer","props":{"class":"mx-name-tabContainer1","widgetId":"21.WorkflowCommons.UserTask_Assign.tabContainer1","defaultTab":0,"tabs":[{"name":"tabPage2","caption":{"$type":"TextProperty","value":"All users"},"isDelayed":false,"refreshOnShow":false,"content":null}]}}],"hideFooter":true,"footer":null}}]}}]}}]}}],"listenTargets":[]
